00034 qp_ip::qp_ip(
00035         const int N_, 
00036         const double Alpha, 
00037         const double Beta, 
00038         const double Gamma, 
00039         const double regularization, 
00040         const double tol_) : 
00041     qp_solver (N_, Alpha, Beta, Gamma, regularization, tol_),
00042     chol (N_)
00043 {
00044     g = new double[2*N];
00045     i2hess = new double[2*N];
00046     i2hess_grad = new double[N*SMPC_NUM_VAR];
00047     grad = new double[N*SMPC_NUM_VAR];
00048 
00049     Q[0] = Beta/2;
00050     Q[1] = Alpha/2;
00051     Q[2] = regularization;
00052     P = Gamma/2;
00053 }

00057 qp_ip::~qp_ip()
00058 {
00059     if (g != NULL)
00060         delete g;
00061     if (i2hess != NULL)
00062         delete i2hess;
00063     if (i2hess_grad != NULL)
00064         delete i2hess_grad;
00065     if (grad != NULL)
00066         delete grad;
00067 }

00092     ub = ub_;

00105 void qp_ip::form_g (const double *zref_x, const double *zref_y)
00106 {
00107     double p0, p1;
00108     double cosA, sinA;
00109 
00110     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
00111     {
00112         cosA = spar[i].cos;
00113         sinA = spar[i].sin;
00114 
00115         // zref
00116         p0 = zref_x[i];
00117         p1 = zref_y[i];
00118 
00119         // inv (2*H) * R' * Cp' * zref
00120         g[i*2] = -(cosA*p0 + sinA*p1)*gain_beta;
00121         g[i*2 + 1] = -(-sinA*p0 + cosA*p1)*gain_beta; 
00122     }
00123 }

00126 
00133 void qp_ip::form_grad_i2hess_logbar (const double kappa)
00134 {
00135     phi_X = 0;
00136     int i,j;
00137 
00138 
00139     // grad = H*X + g + kappa * b;
00140     // initialize grad = H*X
00141     for (i = 0; i < N*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR; i++)
00142     {
00143         grad[i] = X[i] / i2Q[i%3];
00144     }
00145     for (; i < N*SMPC_NUM_VAR; i++)
00146     {
00147         grad[i] = X[i] / i2P;
00148     }
00149 
00150     // finish initalization of grad 
00151     // initialize inverted hessian
00152     // initialize logarithmic barrier in the function
00153     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < 2*N; i++, j += 3)
00154     {
00155         double lb_diff = -lb[i] + X[j];
00156         double ub_diff =  ub[i] - X[j];
00157 
00158         // logarithmic barrier
00159         phi_X -= log(lb_diff) + log(ub_diff);
00160 
00161         lb_diff = 1/lb_diff;
00162         ub_diff = 1/ub_diff;
00163 
00164         // grad += g + kappa * (ub_diff - lb_diff)
00165         grad[j] += g[i] + kappa * (ub_diff - lb_diff);
00166 
00167         // only elements 1:3:N*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR on the diagonal of hessian 
00168         // can change
00169         // hess = H + kappa * (ub_diff^2 - lb_diff^2)
00170         i2hess[i] = 1/(2*Q[0] + kappa * (ub_diff*ub_diff + lb_diff*lb_diff));
00171     }
00172     phi_X *= kappa;
00173 }

00176 
00180 void qp_ip::form_i2hess_grad ()
00181 {
00182     int i,j;
00183     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < N*2; i++)
00184     {
00185         i2hess_grad[j] = - grad[j] * i2hess[i]; 
00186         j++;
00187         i2hess_grad[j] = - grad[j] * i2Q[1]; 
00188         j++;
00189         i2hess_grad[j] = - grad[j] * i2Q[2]; 
00190         j++;
00191     }
00192     for (i = N*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR; i < N*SMPC_NUM_VAR; i++)
00193     {
00194         i2hess_grad[i] = - grad[i] * i2P;
00195     }
00196 }

00199 
00204 void qp_ip::form_phi_X ()
00205 {
00206     int i;
00207 
00208     // phi_X += X'*H*X
00209     for (i = 0; i < N*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR; i++)
00210     {
00211         phi_X += Q[i%3] * X[i] * X[i];
00212     }
00213     for (; i < N*SMPC_NUM_VAR; i++)
00214     {
00215         phi_X += P * X[i] * X[i];
00216     }
00217 
00218     // phi_X += g'*X
00219     for (i = 0; i < 2*N; i++)
00220     {
00221         phi_X += g[i] * X[i*3];
00222     }
00223 }

00225 
00231 void qp_ip::init_alpha()
00232 {
00233     double min_alpha = 1;
00234     alpha = 1;
00235 
00236     for (int i = 0; i < 2*N; i++)
00237     {
00238         // lower bound may be violated
00239         if (dX[i*3] < 0)
00240         {
00241             double tmp_alpha = (lb[i]-X[i*3])/dX[i*3];
00242             if (tmp_alpha < min_alpha)
00243             {
00244                 min_alpha = tmp_alpha;
00245             }
00246         }
00247         // upper bound may be violated
00248         else if (dX[i*3] > 0)
00249         {
00250             double tmp_alpha = (ub[i]-X[i*3])/dX[i*3];
00251             if (tmp_alpha < min_alpha)
00252             {
00253                 min_alpha = tmp_alpha;
00254             }
00255         }
00256     }
00257 
00258     if (min_alpha > tol)
00259     {
00260         while (alpha > min_alpha)
00261         {
00262             alpha *= bs_beta;
00263         }
00264     }
00265     else
00266     {
00267         alpha = 0;
00268     }
00269 }

00272 
00278 double qp_ip::form_bs_alpha_grad_dX ()
00279 {
00280     double res = 0;
00281     
00282     for (int i = 0; i < N*SMPC_NUM_VAR; i++)
00283     {
00284         res += grad[i]*dX[i];
00285     }
00286 
00287     return (res*bs_alpha);
00288 }

00290 
00298 double qp_ip::form_phi_X_tmp (const double kappa)
00299 {
00300     int i,j;
00301     double res = 0;
00302     double X_tmp;
00303 
00304 
00305     // phi_X += X'*H*X
00306     for (i = 0,j = 0; i < 2*N; i++)
00307     {
00308         X_tmp = X[j] + alpha * dX[j];
00309         j++;
00310 
00311         // logarithmic barrier
00312         res -= kappa * (log(-lb[i] + X_tmp) + log(ub[i] - X_tmp));
00313 
00314         // phi_X += g'*X
00315         res += g[i] * X_tmp;
00316 
00317 
00318         // phi_X += X'*H*X // states
00319         res += Q[0] * X_tmp*X_tmp;
00320 
00321         X_tmp = X[j] + alpha * dX[j];
00322         j++;
00323         res += Q[1] * X_tmp*X_tmp;
00324 
00325         X_tmp = X[j] + alpha * dX[j];
00326         j++;
00327         res += Q[2] * X_tmp*X_tmp;
00328     }
00329     // phi_X += X'*H*X // controls
00330     for (i = N*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR; i < N*SMPC_NUM_VAR; i++)
00331     {
00332         X_tmp = X[i] + alpha * dX[i];
00333         res += P * X_tmp * X_tmp;
00334     }
00335 
00336     return (res);
00337 }

00351 void qp_ip::set_ip_parameters (
00352         const double t_, 
00353         const double mu_, 
00354         const double bs_alpha_, 
00355         const double bs_beta_, 
00356         const int max_iter_,
00357         const double tol_out_)
00358 {
00359     t = t_;
00360     mu = mu_;
00361     bs_alpha = bs_alpha_;
00362     bs_beta = bs_beta_;
00363     max_iter = max_iter_;
00364     tol_out = tol_out_;
00365 }

00368 
00374 int qp_ip::solve()
00375 {
00376     double kappa = 1/t;
00377     double duality_gap = 2*N*kappa;
00378     int i;
00379 
00380 
00381     while (duality_gap > tol_out)
00382     {
00383         for (i = 0; (i < max_iter) && solve_onestep(kappa); i++);
00384         if (i == max_iter)
00385         {
00386             return (-1);
00387         }
00388 
00389         kappa /= mu;
00390         duality_gap = 2*N*kappa;
00391     }
00392     return (0);
00393 }
00394 
00395 
00403 bool qp_ip::solve_onestep (const double kappa)
00404 {
00405     int i,j;
00406 
00407 
00408     form_grad_i2hess_logbar (kappa);
00409     form_phi_X ();
00410     form_i2hess_grad ();
00411 
00412     chol.solve (this, i2hess_grad, i2hess, X, dX);
00413 
00414 
00415     // stopping criterion (decrement)
00416     double decrement = 0;
00417     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < N*2; i++)
00418     {
00419         decrement += dX[j] * dX[j] / i2hess[i];
00420         j++;
00421         decrement += dX[j] * dX[j] / i2Q[1];
00422         j++;
00423         decrement += dX[j] * dX[j] / i2Q[2];
00424         j++;
00425     }
00426     for (i = N*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR; i < N*SMPC_NUM_VAR; i++)
00427     {
00428         decrement += dX[i] * dX[i] / i2P;
00429     }
00430     if (decrement < tol)
00431     {
00432         return (false);
00433     }
00434 
00435 
00436     init_alpha ();
00437     // stopping criterion (step size)
00438     if (alpha < tol)
00439     {
00440         return (false); // done
00441     }
00442 
00443 
00444     // backtracking search
00445     double bs_alpha_grad_dX = form_bs_alpha_grad_dX ();
00446     for (;;)
00447     {
00448         if (form_phi_X_tmp (kappa) <= phi_X + alpha * bs_alpha_grad_dX)
00449         {
00450             break;
00451         }
00452 
00453         alpha = bs_beta * alpha;
00454 
00455         // stopping criterion (step size)
00456         if (alpha < tol)
00457         {
00458             return (false); // done
00459         }
00460     }
00461 
00462 
00463     // Move in the feasible descent direction
00464     for (j = 0; j < N*SMPC_NUM_VAR ; j++)
00465     {
00466         X[j] += alpha * dX[j];
00467     }
00468 
00469     return (true);
00470 }
